Row.Text: +1 [ICON_Production] Production to Fishing Boats adjacent to a land tile.
+1 [ICON_Food] Food and [ICON_Gold] Gold to your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to this city. +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold per turn for each foreign [ICON_TradeRoute] Trader passing through this city.
Bonus Resources improved by Farms gain +1 [ICON_Food] Food.
25% of [ICON_Food] Food is carried over after this city gains a [ICON_Citizen] Population.

Replace.Text: Farms gain +1 [ICON_Production] Production if adjacent to a River and +1 [ICON_Gold] if adjacent to any specialty district.
